content:
For better or for worse, I’ve decided to start a blog. I like doing just about anything technical that doesn’t involve biology (I still have the battle scars from freshman biology), and this blog should give me a chance to spread my ramblings. It might end up being pretty random, but hey, normal is boring right?
My current main project is to create a liquid fueled rocket engine. Did I mention I’m nuts? I’ve created a working torch igniter prototype (that needs a lot of work), and am in the process of finishing up a CNC mini-mill. I’ve had my fair share of roadblocks along the way, but needless to say I’ve learned a ridiculous amount so far. I’m currently away from home and attending college at RIT, so the project is being “redirected” a bit so that I can still work on parts of it here.
Even if I can’t finish the project, the entire process will (and has been) a great learning experience for me. Regardless of what I’m working on you’ll get to see my successes and many failures along the way and hopefully get some second-hand learning of what not to do. Feel free to comment and email, as long as it’s not purposefully stupid I’d love to get feedback. I hope you enjoy, cheers!
description: For better or worse, I'm doing it :)
title: Uh oh, I think I'm starting a blog
